mods.abstract: Painting of geese from Medum (Old Kingdom Dynasty IV) at an Egyptian Museum; row of six painted geese and sparse vegetation bordered by dark bands (top and bottom); untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
